S

sanavesa.net - package sanavesa.net
 
sendData(T) - Method in class sanavesa.net.Client
Sends the specified data object to the server.
sendData(T) - Method in class sanavesa.net.NetworkCommunication
Writes the specified data into the connection's output stream, and flushes the stream.
sendData(T) - Method in class sanavesa.net.ServerClient
Sends the specified data object to the client.
sendDataTo(T, ServerClient) - Method in class sanavesa.net.Server
Sends the specified data object to the specified client.
sendDataToAll(T) - Method in class sanavesa.net.Server
Sends the specified data object to all connected clients.
sendDataToMatch(T, Predicate<ServerClient>) - Method in class sanavesa.net.Server
Sends the specified data object to the specified clients that are identified by the predicate.
serialVersionUID - Static variable in class sanavesa.net.DisconnectClientPacket
The generated UID of the packet.
Server - Class in sanavesa.net
The Server class is the backend foundation for the server.
Server() - Constructor for class sanavesa.net.Server
Constructs a new Server instance.
server - Variable in class sanavesa.net.ServerClient
The server this client is connected to.
server - Variable in class sanavesa.net.ServerThread
The server owner of this thread.
ServerClient - Class in sanavesa.net
The ServerClient class is the client representation on the server side.
ServerClient(Server, Socket) - Constructor for class sanavesa.net.ServerClient
Constructs a new client on the server.
ServerClientThread - Class in sanavesa.net
The ServerClientThread class manages the networking transmission on a separate thread.
ServerClientThread(ServerClient) - Constructor for class sanavesa.net.ServerClientThread
Creates a new thread for the client, and calls begins the networking communication loop.
serverSocket - Variable in class sanavesa.net.Server
The socket of the server.
ServerThread - Class in sanavesa.net
The ServerThread class manages the networking transmission on a separate thread.
ServerThread(Server) - Constructor for class sanavesa.net.ServerThread
Creates a new thread for the server, and calls begins the networking communication loop.
setTimeoutDuration(int) - Static method in class sanavesa.net.Client
Sets the timeout duration for blocking until a connection is established or an error occurs.
socket - Variable in class sanavesa.net.Client
The client's socket.
socket - Variable in class sanavesa.net.ServerClient
The client's socket.
startServer(int) - Method in class sanavesa.net.Server
Attempts to start the server.
stopServer() - Method in class sanavesa.net.Server
Stops the server from running, which terminates all connections.
